data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Balanced forces are important during the game both to launch, and defend against, a Camel and Horse Attack. As ____, ____ players ____ setup ____ Elephant ____ Horse ____ one ____ of ____ board ____ a Camel and Horse on ____ other. Setting up and maintaining the Camel on the home rank middle is a good strategy to protect against a Camel-drag but is not ideal if the Camel wishes to participate on either side of a Camel and Horse Attack.
data.partBlankContent: Balanced forces are important during the game both to launch, and defend against, a Camel and Horse Attack. As su__, mo__ players wi__ setup a_ Elephant a__ Horse o_ one ha__ of t__ board a__ a Camel and Horse on t__ other. Setting up and maintaining the Camel on the home rank middle is a good strategy to protect against a Camel-drag but is not ideal if the Camel wishes to participate on either side of a Camel and Horse Attack.
data.fullContent: Balanced forces are important during the game both to launch, and defend against, a Camel and Horse Attack. As such, most players will setup an Elephant and Horse on one half of the board and a Camel and Horse on the other. Setting up and maintaining the Camel on the home rank middle is a good strategy to protect against a Camel-drag but is not ideal if the Camel wishes to participate on either side of a Camel and Horse Attack.
data.answer: 在游戏中，平衡力量对于启动和防御骆驼和马的攻击都很重要。因此，大多数玩家将把大象和马放在棋盘的一边，骆驼和马放在另一边。将骆驼安置在中间位置是防止骆驼被拖走的好策略，但如果骆驼想要参与到骆驼和马攻击的两边，这就不太理想了。
